long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search content of a video on YouTube and Netflix.
This extension enables you to search text within a video and easily navigate to the target scene.

For YouTube videos, extension relies on the auto generated subtitles and currently only supports English language.

For Netflix videos, extension works for any provided subtitles. Simply select the desired subtitle from the Netflix menu and start using the extension.
